channel.title: My new server dev
channel.description:
ok, so this is my first 508 server hope its good!
summary: well, the server is based on bubly/phatt or w/e it is source
i have editied around, im planing to add more just see what you think
i have added to the summoning followers i have added 9 i said 9! new pets!!! more coming
i have changed the starting area about 100% of npc's transferred
i have fixed the world map button!!! in case you get lost on lunar isle lol. pretty easy tbh
added npc's over the island it looks coolies (there like players :P)
added a command so that yo can get the pets :: pets
max combat now lv 138! added the summoning lvs :P
there are now no doors on island (mostly) so you can enter houses now :D
adeed banks to the island!!!!! took a while to find out how to make em work but now they work!
added a barrier to stop people going into a missing map data area of the island :D
added a dream tree gives dream logs which you give to the woodcutting tutor for 20k
most lunar spells are there need correct emotes, effects etc
i have changed the dragon slayer quest so if you were to talk to the npc's before they say funny things (trust me) also the quest isn't so hard to trek around rs just around the island *hint*
still need to add shops, can't figure it out :S
need the button id's for lunar spells ( i have found some gfx's and added them but wrong button's) possibly adding more but that's for now( making a list of button id's for lunar maybe release?)
suggestions will be accepted :D
here's the pictures: http://img444.imageshack.us/my.php?image=homemw3.png
http://img353.imageshack.us/my.php?image=npcti6.png
http://img301.imageshack.us/my.php?image=npccontactnf1.png
sorry if pictures are screwed im new to images lol...

ok, so this is my first 508 server hope its good!

summary:
well, the server is based on bubly/phatt or w/e it is source

i have editied around, im planing to add more just see what you think
